products.name: Revolving Centres
products.description: Our range includes High Speed CNC, Extended Point CNC, Slim Line CNC, Heavy Duty, and Standard Revolving Centres. Available in sizes 2MT, 3MT, 4MT, 5MT, 6MT, and 7MT.

products.name: Tube Centres
products.description: Available in Blunt Type (35-125mm, 75-150mm, 100-200mm, 100-230mm) and Pointed Type (0-3", 0-4", 0-5"). Tapers available: 3MT, 4MT, 5MT, 6MT.

products.name: Drill Sleeves and Extension Sockets
products.description: Extension Sleeves range from 1MT x 2MT to 6MT x 7MT. Drill Sleeves range from 7MT X 6MT to 2MT x 1MT. All products are hardened and ground.
